title: Waterfront Greenery
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Ehehe~ I’ve always wanted to take a boat ride on the pond here~! Today, I’m Lady Kasumin, and I’m traveling by boat. ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>This is a surprisingly large pond...... Oh, look! There are so many flowers blooming on the other side!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I see them! Let’s go take pictures over there~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Leave it to me! I’ve read a ton of stories with boats, so I know exactly how to navigate there! Aye, aye~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s still moving straight......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Let me try instead. I just have to focus...... and move both of my arms at the same time...... Argh, the water is giving so much resistance......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s do it together. Let’s go~.......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>The boat is spinning~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Oh, come on!! Let me do it! This is how you’re supposed to do it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Kasumi-san, you’re amazing!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Your rowing technique is top-notch!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>A refined lady shouldn’t have to do this herself~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
